Source code for JumpScale.grid.grid.CoreModel.ModelObject

import struct



[docs]class ModelObject():

    def __init__(self, ddict={}):
        self.__dict__ = ddict


[docs]    def getCategory(self):
        return self.category



[docs]    def getUniqueKey(self):
        """
        return unique key for object, is used to define unique id
        """
        return self.guid



[docs]    def getContentKey(self):
        """
        """
        return self.guid



[docs]    def getSetGuid(self):
        """
        use osis to define & set unique guid (sometimes also id)
        """
        if self.guid:
            return self.guid
        else:
            return None



[docs]    def getIDs(self):
        if self.guid:
            return struct.unpack("<HHH", self.guid)
        else:
            return None



[docs]    def getObjectType(self):
        return 13



[docs]    def getVersion(self):
        return 1



[docs]    def getMessage(self):
        #[$objecttype,$objectversion,guid,$object=data]
        return [13, 1, self.guid, self.__dict__]



[docs]    def getSerializable(self):
        return self.__dict__.copy()
